actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Senate parties in Harold H. Klingler, Jr. v. The Executive Branch of the Union known as the United States of America, et. al., Civil Action No. 83-V-331-N.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Senate, the President of the Senate, and the Secretary of the Senate in the case of Harold H. Klingler, Jr. v. The Executive Branch of the Union Known as the United States of America, et al.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Senate parties in Harold H. Klingler, Jr. v. The Executive Branch of the Union known as the United States of America, et. al., Civil Action No. 83-V-331-N.
